title: Christmas in July
description:
Wendi Nix, Sam Acho, and Tom Luginbill make early predictions for national championship contenders, The crew also breaks down the ramifications of player unionization. Later, the crew discusses some early Christmas gifts.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: The CFB Live crew make early predictions for the upcoming college football season.
